title: Why do gaming communities get so many random upvotes?
body: Is it like all the members bumping their posts or is there something about them that I am missing?

replies.body: Yeah pretty much. A few of them might get re-tweeted by a famous OPL player, but that's about it.

kek, poor oce boards. At least we still have GD, oh wait there's this guy: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/RdphIJYB-the-official-tony-abbott-appreciation-thread 

lol
